mapper.insert: INSERT INTO picture (userEmailHost, pictureNo, pictureTimestamp, pictureTitle, picturePath, postNo, postTimestamp, userEmailGuest) VALUES ( #{userEmailHost}, #{pictureNo}, #{pictureTimestamp}, #{pictureTitle}, #{picturePath}, #{postNo}, #{postTimestamp}, #{userEmailGuest})
mapper.select: SELECT userEmailHost, pictureNo, pictureTimestamp, pictureTitle, picturePath, postNo, postTimestamp, userEmailGuest FROM picture WHERE userEmailHost = #{userEmail} ORDER BY postTimestamp DESC, postNo DESC

SELECT userEmailHost, pictureNo, pictureTimestamp, pictureTitle, picturePath, postNo, postTimestamp, userEmailGuest FROM picture WHERE userEmailHost = #{userEmailHost} AND postNo = #{postNo} AND postTimestamp = #{postTimestamp}

SELECT userEmailHost, pictureNo, pictureTimestamp, pictureTitle, picturePath, postNo, postTimestamp, userEmailGuest FROM picture WHERE userEmailHost = #{userEmail} AND postNo IS NOT NULL AND postTimestamp IS NOT NULL ORDER BY postTimestamp DESC, postNo DESC

SELECT userEmailHost, pictureNo, pictureTimestamp, pictureTitle, picturePath, postNo, postTimestamp, userEmailGuest FROM picture WHERE userEmailHost = #{userEmail} AND postNo IS NULL AND postTimestamp IS NULL ORDER BY pictureTimestamp DESC, pictureNo DESC
